title: cannot purchase any RP
body:
Whenever i try to buy any RP it says that i have exceeded my maximum number lf attempts and must wait 24 hours even though i have waited well over 24 hours and and only tried to purchase it once. 

All i wanted to do was buy elementalist lux with that nice border :c

replies.body:
The 24-hour lockout period occurs for security reasons. You'll need to wait 24 hours before another **attempt**, otherwise it resets the timer again.

Let me know if you still have issues after waiting again.
Hi there again i've waited over 24 hours and it still appears with the same message.

You may want to reach out to the Bank to ensure everything is good from that side. The previous transaction attempts may have triggered a fraud protection type deal. If they say everything is alright, you should try making the purchase from another computer if possible.
Okay thank you so much for the help.
